project_descr: BRA/14/G31 - The proposed UNDP/GEF initiative is aimed at reducing the greenhouse gas emissions from the iron and steel sector in the Brazilian State of Minas Gerais.

outputs.output_descr: BRA/14/G31 - Develop and demonstrate enhanced, clean conversion technologies for renewable, biomass-based charcoal production, supported by an effective policy framework.
